chinese: 汤姆今天早上没有发烧。
pinyin: Tāng mǔ jīntiān zǎoshang méiyǒu fāshāo.
english: Tom did not have a fever this morning.

english: You don't have to go there.

chinese: 他是世界上最伟大的科学家之一。
pinyin: tā shì shì jiè shàng zuì wěi dà de kē xué jiā zhī yī。
english: He is one of the greatest scientists in the world.
